## IApi.deviceList property

A list of connected physical Jabra devices. Each device object can be consumed by the third party developer. See [IDevice](./jabra-js.idevice.md) for more information.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
deviceList: Observable<IDevice[]>;
```
